globals.site_title: Bellflower Chinese Medicine | Perth, Western Australia
globals.description: Thomas has practised acupuncture, Chinese Herbal Medicine & shiatsu in Sydney's Inner West for over 10 years. He is an accredited member of the Australian Acupunture & Chinese Medicine Association.
globals.footer_description: Thomas Crooks has practised acupuncture, Chinese Herbal Medicine & shiatsu in Sydney's Inner West for over 10 years. He is an accredited member of the Australian Acupunture & Chinese Medicine Association.
